answer: If an inflight emergency requires immediate action the PIC of an aircraft may deviate from any rule in 14 CFR Part 91, the Part of the FARs that regulates aircraft flight operations. If, and only if, the Administrator (the official name of the FAA in this context, requests a written report, the PIC "shall" send a written report to the Administrator about the deviation. (14 CFR Part 91.3)
